name: vault-pets
description: Direct translation of vscode-pets to OBSD. Adds a cute pet to your OBSD vault that follows you around.

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run copy
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
